channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: グーグル、YouTubeの動画を無断で埋め込みリスキンする法輪功関連の動画プラットフォーム「Gan Jing World」に停止命令を出す（Emanuel Maiberg/404 Media）
item.description:
Emanuel Maiberg / 404 Media:
Google sends a cease and desist to Gan Jing World, a video platform linked to Falun Gong that embeds and reskins YouTube videos without permission  —  Google has sent a cease and desist letter to Gan Jing World, a bizarre video platform linked to the Chinese spiritual movement Falun Gong.

item.title: 9年以上の時を経て、ロンドンの警視庁は2014年にブラック・ライブズ・マターの抗議デモの取材を止められたジャーナリスト3人に謝罪し、和解した（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
After more than nine years, London's Met Police apologize and settle with three journalists who were stopped from covering a Black Lives Matter protest in 2014  —  One photographer was hit in the face in the lead-up to the detention of the journalists.  —  The Metropolitan Police has settled …

item.title: Googleによると、2023年にはポリシー違反で5.5Bの広告と12.7Mの広告主アカウントをブロックまたは削除し、2022年のそれぞれ5.2Bと6.7Mから増加した（Nicola Agius/Search Engine Land）
item.description:
Nicola Agius / Search Engine Land:
Google says it blocked or removed 5.5B ads and 12.7M advertiser accounts for violating its policies in 2023, up from 5.2B and 6.7M respectively in 2022  —  The number of advertisers who were blocked or removed due to policy violations nearly doubled compared to the previous year.  —  Chat with SearchBot

item.title: S&Pグローバルがパラマウント・グローバルの債務格付けをジャンクに引き下げ、「リニアテレビエコシステムの悪化」と「DTCストリーミングコストの上昇」を理由に（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
S&P Global cuts Paramount Global's debt rating to junk status, citing the “deterioration of the linear television ecosystem” and higher DTC streaming costs  —  Analyst says more buyers likely to emerge for media company's assets with ratings cut

item.title: 情報筋：元Viceのチーフ、シェーン・スミスが、2023年にViceを破産から買い戻した「フォートレス」グループからVice Mediaを買い戻す資金を調達しようとしている（The Wrap）。
item.description:
The Wrap:
Sources: ex-Vice chief Shane Smith is trying to raise money to buy Vice Media back from Fortress, which led a' group that bought Vice out of bankruptcy in 2023  —  When Vice cofounder Shane Smith disappeared from public view five years ago, it seemed about time.

item.title: 英国のホームレスに新聞の露天商をさせているビッグイシューが、ランサムウェア集団「Qilin」のサイトに掲載され、サイバー事件を確認（Alexander Martin/The Record）
item.description:
Alexander Martin / The Record:
The Big Issue, which pays UK homeless people to be newspaper street vendors, confirms a cyber incident, after being listed on the Qilin ransomware gang's site  —  The Big Issue, a street newspaper in the United Kingdom famed for providing homeless people with a legitimate income by paying …

item.title: マーティン・スコセッシが『Fox Nation』のために、キリスト教の聖人についてのドキュメンタリーシリーズを立ち上げる。
item.description:
Michael M. Grynbaum / New York Times:
Martin Scorsese will headline a documentary series about Christian saints for Fox Nation, as it aspires to become a kind of Netflix for conservative audiences  —  The Oscar-winning director is the latest Hollywood name to sign up for the Fox News streaming platform, joining Kevin Costner, Rob Lowe and Dan Aykroyd.

item.title: アマゾン、オンライン広告ライブラリーの公開に関するDSA規則への準拠を延期するEUの法的措置に敗訴、判事がアマゾンの要求を却下（Clothilde Goujard/Politico）
item.description:
Clothilde Goujard / Politico:
Amazon loses an EU legal bid to delay complying with DSA rules on making its online ad library publicly available, after a judge rejected Amazon's request  —  Tech giant said it is “disappointed with this decision.”  —  Amazon lost a legal bid to delay obeying part of the European Union's new content moderation law.

item.title: LAタイムズで2020年のジョージ・フロイド抗議デモを取材中にミネソタ州警察に襲われたジャーナリスト2人が、州との訴訟を120万ドルで和解（Hannah Wiley/Los Angeles Times）
item.description:
Hannah Wiley / Los Angeles Times:
Two journalists who were attacked by Minnesota police as they covered the 2020 George Floyd protests for the LA Times settle a lawsuit with the state for $1.2M  —  Two journalists who were cornered and attacked by the Minnesota State Patrol as they covered protests over George Floyd's murder …

item.title: ロン・デサンティス氏が任命したディズニー・ワールドの地区理事会、ディズニー社との州訴訟で和解、理事会の権限を制限した変更の撤回に同意（ブルームバーグ）
item.description:
Bloomberg:
The Ron DeSantis-appointed board of Disney World's district settles a state lawsuit with Disney, which agrees to revoke changes that limited the board's power  —  A board appointed by Ron DeSantis to oversee the municipal authority that governs Walt Disney Co. in Florida has voted to settle a state lawsuit against the company.

item.title: NBCニュースのスタッフの中には、ロナ・マクダニエルの雇用と解雇によって共和党筋との関係が損なわれ、ニュース速報が難しくなるとの懸念を示す者もいる（Max Tani/Semafor）
item.description:
Max Tani / Semafor:
Some NBC News staff raise concerns that the hiring and firing of Ronna McDaniel will damage relationships with GOP sources, making breaking news more difficult  —  The News  —  NBC News's dramatic hiring and firing of a former RNC chairwoman this week threatens to undo years of repositioning itself …

item.title: ディズニー、Disney+にHuluを追加、2023年12月から統合のベータテストを実施後、Huluに料金を支払っていないDisney+加入者もHuluの番組を検索可能（Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Alex Weprin / The Hollywood Reporter:
Disney adds Hulu to Disney+, after beta testing the integration since December 2023; Disney+ subscribers who don't pay for Hulu can still search for Hulu shows  —  “Content recommendations are going to be more relevant based on your usage,” says Joe Earley, president of direct-to-consumer for Disney Entertainment.

item.title: 選挙イヤーにポリティコの未経験の首脳陣がどのように変化しているか、ポリティコはDCで元スタッフとの競争激化に直面している（Charlotte Klein/Vanity Fair）
item.description:
Charlotte Klein / Vanity Fair:
How Politico's untested leadership team is changing the outlet in an election year, as Politico faces increased competition in DC from its former staffers  —  Since the last Biden-Trump face-off, the media company has a new owner and global mandate, as well as increased competition in DC from Politico alums.

item.title: ビル・マーが「表現の自由」に焦点を当てたポッドキャスト・ネットワーク「クラブ・ランダム・スタジオ」を立ち上げ、元ESPNキャスターのセージ・スティールを最初のホストに採用（Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Alex Weprin / The Hollywood Reporter:
Bill Maher launches The Club Random Studios, a podcast network with a focus on “freedom of expression”, and hires ex-ESPN anchor Sage Steele as its first host  —  “I am looking for people who are not talking point people,” the HBO host tells THR of his new podcast venture.

item.title: BBCのティム・デイヴィー総局長は、2010年以降のBBCの予算削減は「近視眼的」であり、BBCの将来を損なう危険性があるとし、さらに2億ポンドの予算削減を発表した（Alexandra Topping/The Guardian）。
item.description:
Alexandra Topping / The Guardian:
BBC DG Tim Davie says the BBC's budget cuts since 2010 have been “shortsighted” and risked undermining its future, and announces a further £200M of budget cuts  —  Tim Davie says 14 years of reductions have put its future at risk, as he announces £200m of cuts
